Configuring
Configuring / Configuring document processing features / Using RICOH ProcessDirector Plug-in for Adobe Acrobat
/ Adding the plug-in icon to the Acrobat quick launch bar
Adding the plug-in icon to the Acrobat quick launch bar
Before you can mark up a PDF file, you must make the plug-in the active tool in Adobe Acrobat. Clicking the plug-in icon is a convenient
alternative to clicking Ricoh â‡’ Select in the menu bar. You can permanently place the RICOH ProcessDirector Plug-in for Adobe Acrobat icon on
the Adobe Acrobat quick launch bar.
Follow these steps:
1. Open Adobe Acrobat Professional.
2. Click the Tools menu on the far right.
3. Click Advanced Editing.
4. Right-click the RICOH ProcessDirector Plug-in for Adobe Acrobat icon ( ) and select Add to Quick Tools. The RICOH ProcessDirector Plug-
in for Adobe Acrobat icon is permanently placed in the quick launch bar below the Acrobat main menu.
When the plug-in is the active tool, its icon will be highlighted.
Parent topic: Using RICOH ProcessDirector Plug-in for Adobe Acrobat
